name: User should not able to add pet with invalid payload/body

testSteps.description: When User pass invalid body on a project by submitting POST request on "/pet" endpoint

children.description: Add a new pet to the Store with invalid input body :

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Date: Thu, 27 Oct 2022 10:12:58 GMT
Content-Type: application/json
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Connection: keep-alive
Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *
Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET, POST, DELETE, PUT
Access-Control-Allow-Headers: Content-Type, api_key, Authorization
Server: Jetty(9.2.9.v20150224)

testSteps.description: Then The server should handle it and return a error message with 400 status code.

userStory.narrative: Users should be able to submit GET and POST requests to PetStoreAPI

title: User should not able to add pet with invalid payload/body
